bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition introduced in Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 15 as brought about by an intrusion of wind evil qi into an unbalanced state of qi and blood, mostly in women. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 69: 血風… 由體虛，氣血不調，為風冷所侵故也 , “ Blood wind …is caused by an intrusion of wind cold into a state of physical depletion and failing balance between qi and blood”.
